m_szDocTitle: Delphi Self-Driving Car Embarks On Autonomous Cross-Country Journey | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Delphi Self-Driving Car Embarks On Autonomous Cross-Country Journey March 24th, 2015 by Christopher DeMorro   When it comes to autonomous car technology, automakers great and small are competing with tech companies like Google to bring the first truly self-driving vehicles to market. Yet automakers have a deep parts bin to pull from thanks to suppliers like Delphi, which will send its own self-driving car on the first autonomous coast-to-coast trip in the US. Though Delphi may not be a household name in the same way Audi or Ford are, the components it builds range from audio systems, to driver
